Author: Mark
Comment: Thanks for your comments. The services published are just a first iteration, and we’ll be adding more functionality soon. -Mark Fletcher, Bloglines

Author: Pip
Comment:
That’s excellent Mark! So often service providers release a “first version”, discover it’s “good enough” and don’t ever touch it again.

Bloglines so far seems to have bucked that trend by continually improving its service, so it’ll be really interesting to see where you take it.
